column3: Represents net income less (i) earnings allocated to participating share awards of $  21  million, $  43  million and $  38  million for the years ended December 31, 2017  , 2016  and 2015  , respectively, and (ii) dividends on preferred  shares of $  81  million, $  80  million and $  62  million for the years ended December 31, 2017  , 2016  and 2015  , respectively.
